title: Rainy city street driving with multiple braking events.
caption: A slow-moving vehicle on a rainy day in the city, with multiple braking events.

reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly on a rainy day, which requires more time to react to potential obstacles or pedestrians. The driver must be cautious and maintain a safe distance from other vehicles to avoid collisions in these conditions.
